# transform

**Instance Property**

The transform to apply to the detected horizon.

## Declaration

```swift
var transform: CGAffineTransform { get }
```

## Discussion

Apply the transform’s inverse to orient the image in an upright position and make the detected horizon level.

## Evaluating the Horizon

- **angle**: The angle of the observed horizon.
- **transform(forImageWidth:height:)**: Creates an affine transform for the specified image width and height.
